addtags.name: AddTags
addtags.description: Attaches resource tags to an Amazon CloudSearch domain

defineanalysisscheme.name: DefineAnalysisScheme
defineanalysisscheme.description: Configures an analysis scheme that can be applied to a text or text-array field to define language-specific text processing options

defineexpression.name: DefineExpression
defineexpression.description: Configures an Expression for the search domain

defineindexfield.name: DefineIndexField
defineindexfield.description: Configures an IndexField for the search domain

definesuggester.name: DefineSuggester
definesuggester.description: Configures a suggester for a domain

deletedomain.name: DeleteDomain
deletedomain.description: Permanently deletes a search domain and all of its data

deleteexpression.name: DeleteExpression
deleteexpression.description: Removes an Expression from the search domain

deleteindexfield.name: DeleteIndexField
deleteindexfield.description: Removes an IndexField from the search domain

describeanalysisschemes.name: DescribeAnalysisSchemes
describeanalysisschemes.description: Gets the analysis schemes configured for a domain

describeavailabilityoptions.name: DescribeAvailabilityOptions
describeavailabilityoptions.description: Gets the availability options configured for a domain

describedomainendpointoptions.name: DescribeDomainEndpointOptions
describedomainendpointoptions.description: Gets the domain endpoint options configured for a domain

describedomains.name: DescribeDomains
describedomains.description: Gets information about the search domains owned by this account

describeexpressions.name: DescribeExpressions
describeexpressions.description: Gets the expressions configured for the search domain

describeindexfields.name: DescribeIndexFields
describeindexfields.description: Gets information about the index fields configured for the search domain

describescalingparameters.name: DescribeScalingParameters
describescalingparameters.description: Gets the scaling parameters configured for a domain

describeserviceaccesspolicies.name: DescribeServiceAccessPolicies
describeserviceaccesspolicies.description: Gets information about the access policies that control access to the domain's document and search endpoints

describesuggesters.name: DescribeSuggesters
describesuggesters.description: Gets the suggesters configured for a domain

indexdocuments.name: IndexDocuments
indexdocuments.description: Tells the search domain to start indexing its documents using the latest indexing options

listdomainnames.name: ListDomainNames
listdomainnames.description: Lists all search domains owned by an account

listtags.name: ListTags
listtags.description: Displays all of the resource tags for an Amazon CloudSearch domain

removetags.name: RemoveTags
removetags.description: Removes the specified resource tags from an Amazon ES domain

updateavailabilityoptions.name: UpdateAvailabilityOptions
updateavailabilityoptions.description: Configures the availability options for a domain

updatedomainendpointoptions.name: UpdateDomainEndpointOptions
updatedomainendpointoptions.description: Configures the domain endpoint options for a domain

updatescalingparameters.name: UpdateScalingParameters
updatescalingparameters.description: Configures scaling parameters for a domain

updateserviceaccesspolicies.name: UpdateServiceAccessPolicies
updateserviceaccesspolicies.description: Configures the access rules that control access to the domain's document and search endpoints

document.name: document
document.description: Allows access to the document service operations

search.name: search
search.description: Allows access to the search operations

suggest.name: suggest
suggest.description: Allows access to the suggest operations
